body:
<!--StartFragment-->

It is the EVENT OF THE YEAR; it's the LIVE RECORDING CONCERT with Sound From Heaven

   The "test" edition (as Dew Keys, CEO of Sound From Heaven, puts it) of the Live Recording Concert was a huge success, thanks to the collaborative effort from the dedicated, talented and passionate crew.

![sound from heaven](https://res.cloudinary.com/dyt6izhug/image/upload/v1606558961/sfh03_qs7jl7.jpg "Dew keyz, ceo Sound From Heaven ")

   The ceremony which was heralded by Miss Damarise featured icons like Oswald, Liam Minstrel, NC Edwin, Miriam Chinwe and just to name a few. It was all music, dance and Sound From Heaven.

![Sound from heaven](https://res.cloudinary.com/dyt6izhug/image/upload/v1606559058/sffh01_crnkej.jpg "Attendees")

   Headed by Dew Keys, Sound From Heaven is an organisation with a myriad of youth-empowering arms; a record label being one of her projects.

   The convener, Minister Dew Keys elucidated how losing his passport couldn't stop him from being present for the program...

"...I flew in from Massachusetts and had to transit in Greece...then my passport got missing...the pilot halted the flight and wouldn't move until it was found...I told the Holy Spirit I had to be present for this program in Cameroon...few minutes later it was found..."

   The "test" edition which took place on Saturday, November 21st, 2020 at Chariot Hotel and hosted hundreds of people was clearly a sign of better days to come. Minister Dew Keys, CEO of Sound From Heaven puts it in his own words...

"...today was just a test to see if it was possible...your presence here is our confirmation...next year, we will fill the stadium to capacity..."

   Always behind the scene, these guys made the evening an aesthetic one; MBS SYSTEMS, 44 PICTURES, and MR. BLISS (sound designer). 

   The peak moment was the keynote delivered by the impeccable Dew Keys where he not only led a powerful worship session followed by a word of wisdom, but also enlightened everyone present on how the Holy Spirit works...

"...we are the pen casing, the Holy Ghost is the INK...we are made the express image of God...in all you do, LOVE; because LOVE is the only thing the devil can't fake..."

   Overall, the Live Recording Concert 2020 first (or test) edition was an elative experience and we can't wait for next year's.

![Sound from Heaven](https://res.cloudinary.com/dyt6izhug/image/upload/v1606559119/sfh02_z0p5wr.jpg "Moments in the event")

<!--EndFragment-->
summary: The "test" edition (as Dew Keys, CEO of Sound From Heaven, puts it) of the Live Recording Concert was a huge success, thanks to the collaborative effort from the dedicated, talented and passionate crew.
